parameters:
"Ugh, this atmosphere... There's an incredibly strong curse
presence."\n<Yukine>\F[15]
"O-Onee-san... it hurts... my body is stinging."\n<Saku>\F[15]\AA[FF]\FF[26]

"Saku, wait here... It's dangerous to get any closer to the
core of the curse."\n<Yukine>\F[4]\AA[F]\FF[26]
"Y-Yes... please come back quickly."\n<Saku>\F[4]\AA[FF]\FF[23]

(Let's check out that shrine over there. There must be
something... ...)\FF[23]\F[4]\AA[F]
A
"There's something inside the shrine... Is this a stone?"\n<Yukine>\F[4]

In the dilapidated shrine, there is a stone about the size
of a child's head, pale in color, placed within.\F[4]

"Is this the sacred object of Saku Kagetsuki? The strong
emotions coming from this sacred object are... huh...
'lonely'? Why?"\n<Yukine>\F[10]

"Ugh, it's started to emit a terrible curse. Saku Kagetsuki
has noticed us!"\n<Yukine>\F[15]
"Kyaaah!"\n<Yukine>\F[16]
"Yukine Onee-san!?"\n<Saku>\FF[27]
"It's okay... I just got a little shock."\n<Yukine>\F[9]\AA[F]\FF[27]

"I wonder if it's impossible to do something about the
sacred object with the small sword and necklace. If only we
had something to break its core..."\n<Yukine>\F[10]\AA[F]\FF[27]
(It seems impossible to get close to the shrine...)
"...There's something inside the shrine... Is this a stone?"\n<Yukine>\F[4]

(Inside the dilapidated shrine, there is a stone about the
size of a child's head, pale in color. It feels slightly
cold to the touch, yet I can sense something like body
warmth.)\F[4]

"Is this the sacred object of Saku Kagetsuki? The strong
emotions coming from this sacred object are... eh...
'lonely'? Why?"\n<Yukine>\F[10]

"Ugh, it's starting to emit a terrible curse. Saku Kagetsuki
has noticed us!"\n<Yukine>\F[15]
"With this dagger... eh, ah!"\n<Yukine>\F[19]
"It's no good..."\n<Yukine>\F[15]
"...That's right. Maybe that sword can break it."\n<Yukine>\F[4]

I grip the obtained katana with a prayerful feeling. The
hefty Japanese sword is heavy for me, but I firmly grasp
it.\F[4]\AA[N]
"...Please, break!"\n<Yukine>\F[4]
"Ei!"\n<Yukine>\F[9]
b3
Light deactivate
clear_all_weathers
D_TEXT \ow[0]\c[15]Current_Location: 15
Flashlight off
朔

(It's an old shrine. Inside, there's a shattered sacred
object.)

(There's no longer a hint of a curse on the crumbled white
stone.)
ERS_MAKE_TEMPLATE 18 6 4
"Yukine Onee-san... are you still...?"\n<Saku>\FF[23]
"Just wait a little bit longer. I'll be right there."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[23]
"Okay, got it."\n<Saku>\F[1]\AA[FF]\FF[23]
(Let's check out that shrine)\FF[23]\F[4]\AA[F]
"Onee-chan..."\n<Saku>\FF[23]

"Saku, let's get out of here quickly. I'm sure Sakuragetsuki
will come here."\n<Yukine>\F[7]\AA[F]\FF[23]
"Yeah... Onee-chan... can you hold my hand?"\n<Saku>\F[7]\AA[FF]\FF[23]

"I'm sorry. It's tough here, isn't it... Let's get out
soon."\n<Yukine>\F[8]\AA[F]\FF[23]
(I might have pushed Saku too hard...)\n<Yukine>\F[8]\AA[F]\FF[23]
Light radius 130 #FFFFFFF
D_TEXT \ow[0]\c[15]Current_Location:_Room_facing_the_garden 15

"Ah, the entrance... As I thought, we've been found by
Sakuragetsuki. We better leave quickly."\n<Yukine>\F[8]
"Yukine Onee-chan, let's go."\n<Saku>\F[8]\AA[FF]\FF[43]
"That's right... We need to find an exit."\n<Yukine>\F[7]\AA[F]\FF[43]

"Saku... I remembered. I remembered, Yukine Onee-san.
Saku... long ago, became a shrine maiden for the gods."\n<Saku>\FF[23]

"Yes. Saku's world was created for her sake. Sacrificing a
tremendous number of lives, it absorbed Saku's parents..."\n<Yukine>\F[10]\AA[F]\FF[23]
"The gods..."\n<Saku>\F[10]\AA[FF]\FF[23]

"To prevent Saku from escaping this world, many people were
killed. To fill their own loneliness, they confined Saku...
and created many evil spirits."\n<Yukine>\F[4]\AA[F]\FF[23]

"...Saku, let's get out of here. After all, we shouldn't
stay in a place like this."\n<Yukine>\F[4]\AA[F]\FF[23]
"Yukine Onee-san..."\n<Saku>\F[4]\AA[FF]\FF[23]
Light radius 130 #FFFFFFF
D_TEXT \ow[0]\c[15]Current_Location:_Room_facing_the_garden 15

"Ah, the entrance... As expected, we've been found by Saku's
calamity. We should leave quickly."\n<Yukine>\F[8]
"Yukine Onee-san, let's go"\n<Saku>\F[8]\AA[FF]\FF[43]
"That's right... we need to find an exit."\n<Yukine>\F[7]\AA[F]\FF[43]

"...That's right. I found this at the shrine, and I think
it's probably a part of the doll."\n<Yukine>\F[3]\AA[F]\FF[43]
"Huh... haven't we already collected them all?"\n<Saku>\F[8]\AA[FF]\FF[22]
"Yes, I thought so too... Well, bring this closer."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[22]
"Huh? My body feels... warm... cozy."\n<Saku>\F[1]\AA[FF]\FF[40]
"Saku's body... your complexion has improved."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[40]

"Really? I don't really understand, but it's easier to
move."\n<Saku>\F[1]\AA[FF]\FF[40]

"Maybe it's because all the parts of the doll have been
assembled? Anyway, I'm glad Saku is feeling better."\n<Yukine>\F[2]\AA[F]\FF[40]
"With this... can I play with Yukine Onee-san too?"\n<Saku>\F[2]\AA[FF]\FF[22]
"Yes. Once we get outside, let's play together."\n<Yukine>\F[2]\AA[F]\FF[22]
"Yay!"\n<Saku>\F[2]\AA[FF]\FF[45]

(With this, the doll's body is complete. The source of the
curse has been destroyed, and now we need to retrieve Saku's
physical body and find an exit to return to the original
world.)\FF[45]\F[1]\AA[F]
